request.description:
Retrieves action log records set associated with action item
specified by name and identifier. Works in asynchronous mode.
Returns one of two action results.
[Ok] with set of records and [Status Code] 200.
[NoContent] with [Status Code] 204.

body.raw:
{
  "userId": 5,
  "module": "MedicationsAPI",
  "actionType": 2,
  "actionItem": "Drugs",
  "itemId": 3,
  "itemState": 
  {
    "patientId": 4,
    "userId": 5,
    "drugId": 2,
    "duration": 14,
    "notes": "Doctor notes.",
    "isFinished": false,
    "isDeleted": false,
    "drug": null,
    "patient": null,
  },
  "description": "Drug has been updated."
}

request.description:
Sends action log record to database
in asynchronous mode.
Returns one of two action results.
[Created] with created record and [Status Code] 201.
[BadReques] with message and [Status Code] 400.
